main.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about AI-friendly SEO analysis
main.faq1A: AI Preparedness Score measures how well your website is optimized for AI assistants and search engines. It analyzes factors like structured data, prompts.txt files, and content organization.
main.faq2A: Our analysis uses the same metrics as Google Lighthouse and checks for the latest AI optimization signals. Results are based on current web standards and AI assistant requirements.
main.faq3Q: What is prompts.txt and why do I need it?
main.faq3A: prompts.txt is a new standard that helps AI assistants understand your website better. It provides context and instructions for how AI should interpret and present your content.
main.faq4Q: How often should I check my site?
main.faq4A: We recommend checking your site monthly or after major content updates. AI optimization standards evolve rapidly, so regular monitoring ensures you stay current.
main.faq5A: Yes! Meta-Scan provides comprehensive AI-friendly SEO analysis completely free. We believe every website should be optimized for the AI-powered future of search.
